abstrac: I swear upon my ancestors' honor that I will work on whatever you need me to, for as long as I am required to do so until it is finished. That is the Powers' Promise.
bio:
Let's see, I was born in the city of Macon, Georgia. However, I grew up in Warner Robins, Georgia, which is a lot like Macon just without the rampant homelessness and the shootings/robberies happen a lot less often. 
I graduated from the University of Georgia with a Bachelor's degree in Creative Writing back in 2010, it was around this time that I split from Fairchild roofing, where I had worked my last two college years as a virtual assistant/data entry specialist/accountant/social media marketing expert. I'm not quite sure how I juggled the 30 hour a week workload, along with all of my exams, making it to class on time, in the morning, etc. Yet, I somehow managed it. I think that I'm a much better man for it and for not giving up. 

It was after obtaining my degree in the early summer/late spring of 2010 that I began working for Cracked.com. I worked as a consultant for them for seven years until which time I left for a job at the Daily Wire. 

I was with the Daily Wire for four years until I had a sudden health scare. My heart suddenly stopped, out of no where. Luckily my best friend(who just so happens to know CPR) was there and kept me alive until the paramedics arrived. They revived me with the defibrillator. It was at that point that they decided they needed to monitor me for the next two weeks. So I sat in the hospital for two weeks and by the time I had gotten out, my job with the Daily Wire was no longer there for me. That was back in 2021, I had been searching for other employment ever since then, but no luck until I discovered freelancing.
My hours of operation are basically 24/7, my editing payment terms goes as follows: $1.00 for every 200 words edited and $1.00 for every 25 words written

abstrac: Logo Design | Illustration Design | Graphic Design
bio:
Hi there. With over 9 years of experience in the field and after working with numerous Fortune 500 companies, I've decided to go out on my own and do the work that truly fulfills me – freelance design of all types.

I specialize in modern branding and would love to create something timeless and unique for you. I have a very fast turnaround time and am extremely easy to communicate with at all times during the day.

I have a wide range of styles and know all of the ins and outs of not only logo design but collateral across all platforms and what a brand needs to thrive.

I offer the following services:
*Logo Designs
*Illustration
*Graphic Designs
*Corporate Identity
*Website Design
*Brochure Designs
* Stationery Designs
*Catalog Designs
*Animations
*Info-graphics

Let's get in touch and please feel free to reach out with any questions or for any additional samples (I've got plenty – all specifically tailored to different types of projects).

I look forward to working with you.
Cheers,
Poonam

Our regular business hours are from 9 AM to 6 PM (UTC +05:30), but we are a customer-oriented company and are willing to work according to the Customer's schedule and his time zone. 

We are ready for both hourly payment and Fixed payment for the project. Either way, we accept the money only after the client has been satisfied with the result.

bio:
Hello there.

Intermediate Interior Designer graduated from architecture school, trained in rendering, and specialize in 
realistic visualization, often help potential clients bring their project to life and help them visualize the space and design. 
Proficient in creating 2D and 3D renderings, drawings, and models. Highly effective at contributing ideas and transforming thoughts into realized plans. I have a well-equipped skill set that includes 2D and 3D digital representation through a variety of programs such as SketchUp, Autocad, Lumion & Enscape for 5 years.

Thank you for taking the time to read this. I appreciate your support in my journey.

Hello, I am LesXian, Intermediate architectural/interior designer specializing in 3D visualization & rendering.

If you need a huge number of high-quality renderings with a limited budget to be done in a small model in a short time, then you are looking for me.

-provide 3D Modeling and 3D Realistic Renderings + Animation Walkthrough to put life into your ideas, needs, and products, all within your budget and time frame.
-well-equipped skill set of 2D and 3D digital representation through a variety of programs such as SketchUp, Enscape & Lumion.

Why I Can Help You:
-Strong passion for 3D modeling and can create 3D Realistic Visualization for most of the design proposals. 
-Offer the best 3D design solutions at reasonable prices to put life in your project
-Create any 3D rendered view from your 2D drawings

What I Can Help You: 
-3D Realistic Visualization (Landscape / Interior / Exterior)
-3D Modelling
-3D Animations of all the above said

If you require my services, please inbox me. We will discuss further your projects.

abstrac: Automotive Software Architect and Functional Safety Professional, Project Manager
bio:
I am an Italian-Brazilian guy who has 4 names and over 14 years of experience in Embedded Systems Engineering and Project Management. The vast majority of this time I invested in the automotive industry designing event-driven software architectures based on real-time frameworks and RTOS.

During all those years, besides also gaining experience in hardware and system design, I became passionate about doing things well, with quality and safety. That is why I now focus my knowledge in the areas of development process capability and improvement, functional safety, and project management; And I do have some nice badges to back me up on that, such as the Project Management Professional (PMP) by PMI, Automotive Functional Safety Professional (AFSP) by SGS-TÜV Saar, the Provisional Assessor Automotive SPICE by Intacs, and the Professional Scrum Master (PSM I) by Scrum.org.

Furthermore, I attended in total to more than 60 courses, conferences, seminars, and workshops; I also travelled around Europe, South America, the USA, and China on business.
